Name: Little Stars
About the game: Description Little Stars is a relaxing puzzle game set in the ambience of the night sky. The puzzles in question are rooted in graph theory and inspired by the Icosian game, a mathematical game invented by William Rowen Hamilton in 1857. How to play Click and drag (or just click) to connect stars together. If the stars are white, then draw all the lines to clear the level. If the stars are pink, then draw a loop using every star exactly once. There is an option to skip a limited number of levels for those who are not interested by the more challenging puzzles.
